completions.nl_description: Change the bottom-leftmost 'R' colored object to 'B' in all grids.
Recolor the bottommost red object in each column to blue.
Change the color of the bottom leftmost red to blue.
Recolor the bottom-most red cell to blue.
Recolor the bottom-most object of color R to color B.
Color the bottom cell of the 'R' object to 'B'.
Recolor the bottom-most 'R' pixels to 'B'.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (color_equals (color_of this) R) (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) O)))) (apply (update_color B))))

completions.nl_description: Change the color of the bottom-right cell of each red object to blue.
Recolor the lowest 'R' object in each column to 'B'.
Recolor the bottom-most red object to blue.
Recolor the bottom-most red cell in each column to blue
Change the color of all terminal objects of color R to B
Change the color of the bottom-most red cell to blue.
Recolor the bottommost R to B
Update the color of the southwesternmost object of color R to color B.
Recolor the bottom-most red object in each grid to blue.
Recolor the bottommost 'R' objects to color B
Move all objects of color R toward the bottom if there is an empty cell below them.
Recolor the bottommost red square in each column to blue.
Recolor the bottom-most cell of the largest red objects to blue.
Recolor the object at the bottom-left corner of each grid to color B.
Recolor to B all the objects of color R that are connected to but are not topleft-most.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter
            (and
                (color_equals (color_of this) R)
                (and
                    (neighbor_of this other)
                    (and
                        (color_equals (color_of other) O)
                        (not (and
                            (neighbor_of this other)
                            (color_equals (color_of this) R))))
                    )
            )
        )
        (apply
            (update_color B)
        )
    )
)

completions.code:

        (filter (and (size_equals (size_of this) 1) (neighbor_of this other)))
        (apply (update_color B))
    )
)
